definition: surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc

sentences.english: Photocopy of this Entry Form is acceptable.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎使用本表格之影印本。

sentences.english: Please retain a photocopy for you and your employee's own records.
sentences.chinese: 請閣下與僱員各保留一份影印本作存檔之用。

sentences.english: Photocopies of certificates etc. confirming qualifications, membership, etc.
sentences.chinese: 證書影印本，證明資格及會籍等。

sentences.english: Please make photocopy of this form if needed.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，請自行影印本表格。

sentences.english: Photocopies of musical score are NOT allowed to be used during the competition.
sentences.chinese: 參賽者不得使用任何樂譜影印本作比賽之用。

sentences.english: Present the original and the photocopy of any supporting document when submitting the application form.
sentences.chinese: 遞交申請表時請出示有關證明文件之正本及影印本。

sentences.english: Please photocopy this form for more entries.
sentences.chinese: 如欄位不夠請影印本表格。

sentences.english: A photostatic copy of this authorization shall be as valid as the original.
sentences.chinese: 此授權書的影印本與正本具同等效力。

sentences.english: Please photocopy this form, if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 如有需要，請自行影印本表格。

sentences.english: You can read a preprint of the paper here.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在這裏閱讀的論文預印本。

sentences.english: Ivy Ma made sketches on prints with charcoal and pencil.
sentences.chinese: 珠利用炭筆及鉛筆在印本上素描。

sentences.english: Please attach a Xeroxed copy of your ID to your application form.
sentences.chinese: 請在申請表上附上您的身份證件影印本。

sentences.english: Students should retain a photocopy of the Deposit Form for reference or possible refund in the future.
sentences.chinese: 學生宜保存存款單影印本，以作紀錄或將來退款之用。

sentences.english: Would you please give me a reprint?
sentences.chinese: 您能不能給我一份抽印本？

sentences.english: Any good public library will have a copy.
sentences.chinese: 一般的公共圖書館都有該書的影印本。

sentences.english: E-print is an open communication intermedium of scholarly information.
sentences.chinese: 電子預印本是一種開放的學術信息交流媒介。

definition: manuscript (of a book etc)/sketch (of a design etc)
to set in print/to diffuse/to publish
manuscript copy of a book (before the printing press)
